page.title: 06The Shopping Centre,Abingdon
page.content: The shopping centre,on a large housing estate,opened in 1984 and comprises a supermarket ,video rentals, chemist, greengrocer, newsagent,wine store, hairdresser,a doctor's surgery, a dentists'surgery, a solicitors and a building society.The smaller shops have upto 2,000 customers each week, while the large supermarket has 6,000. 57% of people we interviewed used the centre 2or3 times per week and 28% used the centre every day. 64% of shoppers do their main grocery shopping elsewhere. The busiest day for most shops is Saturday, although the supermarket's busiest day is a Friday,when families tend to do their weekend shopping.60% of our sample use the supermarket most frequently 86% live in the immediate locality. 42% of shoppers said they would like a bakery shop on one of the vacant sites.
